content: **trendy sweater hat and scarf in snow ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see scarf pattern here 1 see jumper pattern here 2 -------------------- **hat** **size** one-size **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 100 g color no 20 purple-mix + en remainder brown e g no 3 for flower drops crochet hook size 7 mm \ us k/10½ crochet gauge hook size is only recommended 9 double_crochet x 6 5 row = 10 x 10 cm \ 4 x 4 uk version 3 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/0-387-trendy-scarf 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/0-387-trendy-sweater 3 http //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=3157&cid=19
